As Legacy began to walk away, it was clear that Tucson could hear his every=
 foot step.  He was still quite displeased with Legacy's insuborination but=
 with Talon's gentile touch, his expression changes from the cold look upon=
 his face, to a soft and gentile smile as he gently puts his hand over hers=
.

"I was wondering when you would wake up.  I missed having you around."

=
Meanwhile, Straight Shot quickly spots Kup, and quickly gathers an energon =
drink for him, hoping to help him re energize further.

"Here, ya might wan=
t this Kup.  It'll help ya re energize faster."

Quickstride nodds.

"Good =
ta have ya back up sir. Oh um, FYI, be - careful around Tucson, he's kind o=
f in a bad mood right now.."

Straight Shot nodds.

"Yeah, Legacy kinda pus=
hed the wrong buttons with 'em... Again. Legacy's lucky Tucson hasn't explo=
ded on him yet."

Quickstride raises a brow.

" If legacy keeps oversteppin=
g his boundaries, it will happen.  You should've heard him raise his voice =
just now, Kup.. Could swear the entire ark was vibrating due to the level o=
f his voice."

Uproar now wakes up, scratching behind his head.

"Is that w=
hat that vibration was all about? I thought it was another quake.  Okay so =
what did Legacy do ta deserve another shout match with Tucson?"

Quickstrid=
e looks back to him.

"The usual, he tried to go against Tucson's orders.  =
And you know what happens if we disrespect a Prime, right?"

Uproar nodds.
=

"Ohh yeah, that's why I would never dare ta do anything like that, noooo w=
aaaay, especially with Tucson. As far as I'm concerned, like Rodimus, what =
he says, goes.  Legacy better watch his step, that's two strikes against hi=
m now. And yeah, I've been keepn' count."

Straight Shot frowns.

"I'm surp=
rised he's even still with us. Something about him so creeps me out it's no=
t funny."
